reviews.name: Thalie
reviews.text: Propre, bien décoré, on aperçoit la Tour Eiffel de la cuisine ! Bien situé près d'un quartier vivant avec restaurants, magasins etc...

reviews.name: Stella
reviews.text: Thierry a été super hôte! Sympa et disponible à tout moment. L'appartement est spacieux bien décoré. Je super recommande! :D

reviews.name: Mat
reviews.text: Nous revenons chez Thierry ET petit appartement toujours aussi agréable lumineux très propre pratique avec ascenceur et quartier proche de tout Nous avons pris le petit déjeuner au soleil sur la terrasse au niveau des toits en zing un séjour très agréable appartement à recommander !

reviews.name: Afar
reviews.text: Mes deux invités ont été totalement enchanté de leur séjour chez Thierry. Merci pour tout! Thierry mérite bien sa médaille de super host.

reviews.name: Pascal
reviews.text: un accueil chaleureux malgré leur tardive, un appartement décoré avec beaucoup de goût, un sixième étage qui survole les toits et le bruit, une vue directe sur la tour Eiffel qui c'étincelle toutes les heures. A 15 mn du centre Pompidou et du Louvre. Une bibliothèque sur Paris multilingue. Un hôte plein de bonnes intentions. vraiment du bonheur pour une première avec Airbnb. Pascal de Bretagne

reviews.name: Corinne
reviews.text: Toujours parfait. On adore revenir chez Thierry. On s'y sent si bien. L'appartement est superbe et bien placé .

reviews.name: Romain
reviews.text: Appartement très agréable et décoré avec goût, le tout bien placé et en bonus une vue sur la tour Eiffel, c'est parfait ! Notre hôte Thierry à été agréable et discret. Je n'hésiterai pas à renouveler l'expérience !

reviews.name: Mat
reviews.text: merci Thierry APPART parfait pour tout : l'emplacement , la déco, le confort,la vue sur les toits de PARIS et même sur la tour EIFFEL depuis la cuisine ! la gentillesse de Thierry et sa disponibilité nous reviendrons pour profiter de la terrasse à la belle saison MAT

reviews.name: Cécile
reviews.text: Thierry est un hôte accueillant et très disponible ... Merci pour cet accueil chaleureux.

reviews.name: Jean-Marc
reviews.text: Hôte chaleureux et très discret, très bon accueil, appartement à la hauteur de sa description, et au centre de l'action parisienne, super séjour !

reviews.name: Laurent
reviews.text: Très bon accueil, l'appartement est idéalement situé, fonctionnel et calme. A recommander !

reviews.name: Julien
reviews.text: L'appartement est vraiment très bien situé et proche de toutes commodités. Il est vraiment décoré avec goût et très propre. Je le conseille vivement!!!

reviews.name: Steven
reviews.text: Super appartement! Così et très bien situé 5 étoile

reviews.name: Denise
reviews.text: Nous avons beaucoup apprécié l'emplacement et les fonctionnalités de l'appartement deThierry. Nous étions toutrès du métro et avons bien aimé la vue du balcon. Nous avons été accueilli par Bertino qui a été très attentionné, accessible et de bons conseils. L'appartement était très propre. Nous le recommanderons à nos amis.

reviews.name: Lauren
reviews.text: Thierry's apartment was wonderful. We stayed for 3 nights and were in a great location, close to the metro and central to all of the major sites in Paris. Also, there is a wonderful view of the Eiffel tower from the kitchen window. I would absolutely stay here again.

reviews.name: Ida
reviews.text: It was a very nice apartment that was better than we expected! Nice view, big balcony etc! :D

reviews.name: Daniel
reviews.text: Great host, with an excellent helper who will get you into the apartment and see to it that all of your needs are met. The place was clean and ready for us on arrival. We enjoyed our stay in this Parisian apartment.

reviews.name: Warren
reviews.text: Thierry's apartment was fantastic, just as pictured in the description. The location is just up the street from Montorgueil, so there's easy access to great restaurants, bars, and shops, but just far enough away to avoid the massive crowds. The view from the outdoor balcony is wonderful, and the kitchen window holds a great surprise view of the Eiffel Tower!

reviews.name: Allan
reviews.text: Fantastic place to stay! Exactly as described and pictured. Thierry was a great host. Thank you.

reviews.name: Jessalyn
reviews.text: Wonderful stay!! It was in a great location and we were able to walk everything! Beautiful view!

reviews.name: Jaimie
reviews.text: We loved this apartment. It was charming and cozy. This apartment is perfect for a family or two couples that don't mind sharing a bathroom. Access to the shower is through the bedroom. It was clean and had plenty of fresh towels. The shower was spacious and had a great view. The balcony added extra Parisian charm. Everything is within walking distance from this apartment. Overall a great stay! We would stay here again next time we're in Paris! Thierry was a great host.

reviews.name: Elaine
reviews.text: Absolutely loved Thierry's place. Walking distance to everything you could possibly need...shops, bars, restaurants and the metro. Really enjoyed the super buzz around the streets - great atmosphere. We would certainly recommend Thierry's place!

reviews.name: John
reviews.text: Wonderful apartment in a great building in a very great location. Communication prior to and during check-in was excellent, and the apartment was exactly as pictured and described. You cannot beat this location: very central for those visitors looking to visit popular museum sites, attractions, Montmartre, etc and close the Metro. Amazing restaurants and nightlife are just steps away as well. If you're looking for a central location at an amazing value with a great host, this is your place to stay.

reviews.name: Marina
reviews.text: We had a wonderful time staying at Thierry's airbnb. Would recommend to anyone on their first time to Paris or a veteran traveler there.

reviews.name: Hannah
reviews.text: Wonderful apartment in a perfect location. We walked most places and took the metro to others. We inadvertently got involved in the film premiere next door at cinema Rex. All a lot of fun. Thierry is a perfect host. Good communication and instructions and friendliness. Lovey short stay.

reviews.name: Rob
reviews.text: The apartment was fantastic. Thierry was very communicative and did a great job getting us to the apartment and being flexible in letting us drop our bags off. The apartment had everything we needed and was situated in a great area to be able to walk to nearly everything you'd like to see around the city center. We loved having the flexibility to use the kitchen and appreciated the pots and pans provided.

reviews.name: Qianzheng
reviews.text: The flat is great and the housekeeper is really nice.

reviews.name: Caleb
reviews.text: Loved our stay. Everything was exactly as described, super smooth communication and an incredible location.

reviews.name: Omar
reviews.text: A great apt, and location. I'd love to stay again

reviews.name: Joe
reviews.text: Thierry's apartment is gem. The floor to ceiling french doors bathe the room in light while also providing access to a balcony overlooking classic rooftops, even in the rain it was enjoyable. A sweet surprise from the bathroom and kitchen windows is the eiffel tower in the distance sparkling on the hour each evening. The apartment was perfect for everything I needed and enjoy (loved the generous size shower). It is in close proximity to the Bonne Nouvelle metro station and only a short walk (or one stop) to St. Denis metro where you can connect to almost any station . There are several markets all within walking distance to pick any necessities (and guilty pleasures) as well as plenty of restaurants and cafes (Delaville Cafe, Frenchie To Go , Hoppy for great beers and classic American rock and even a Starbucks around the corner for those without time to sit and enjoy an espresso). Continue from Poissenniere to Montorgueil and you will discover shop after shop providing treats for the palette: bakeries, chocolatiers, fruit markets, charcuterie, cafes. Great apartment and great location. Thank you Thierry for all the details you provided in advance and your quick responses onsite. I had a wonderful stay, in large part due to you great apartment. Thank you!

reviews.name: Ingo
reviews.text: Thierry's places is really great and 100% matches the description. We staid there for five days with our kids (9 and 12) and all of us are already looking forward to returning in the - hopefully - not so distant future :). The place is very close to public transport and really, really close to an area with great shops, bars, and restaurants.

reviews.name: 泽菁
reviews.text: great location,nice owner and comfortable bed.

reviews.name: Johanna
reviews.text: Theirry's apartment could not have been better us. We came to Paris for a long weekend stay with our children who are 4 & 6 and the apartment was fabulous. It was very clean, had great amenities and it was in a great location. Just a 2 minute walk to the metro, restaurants, a cinema and shops were just around the corner including an M&S food hall. Theirry met us with our keys as soon as we arrived and we were able to leave our luggage there even though we were too early to check in. Throughout the whole process the communication with Theirry was great and it made our first stay in an air bnb a breeze. Many thanks for your hospitality and we hope to be back again soon! I couldn't recommend this place more.

reviews.name: Jinny
reviews.text: Good location with beautiful view of tour Eiffel from the window ! Walk to the museum of Louvre within half an hour and near the Metro. The apartment is very clean and cozy and suitable for our 3 adults and 1 child. Nice experience.

reviews.name: LIz
reviews.text: Great apartment, it had everything that we needed for a short city break. It was brilliant having our own private view of the Eiffel Tower from the kitchen. Good location, great for exploring the surrounding area by foot but also there are two metro stations close by. Lots of fantastic food choices in the surrounding area too.

reviews.name: Colin
reviews.text: This is an amazing find - so central, next to great shops and restaurants. Thierry is a wonderful host and this is a real treasure.

reviews.name: Tess
reviews.text: We had a brilliant stay at Thierrys place. It is exactly as described and very cosy and warm. Thierry was very good with communication and helpful. We ate every morning at a beautiful little cafe nearby called frenchie with excellent coffee. Fantastic all round!

reviews.name: Christie
reviews.text: Thierry's place is very well located within walking distance of all the cool places. The apartment is clean, comfortable and perfect for a lovely stay in Paris.

reviews.name: Marie
reviews.text: The host is kind and location is very nice!

reviews.name: Oscar
reviews.text: Wonderful apartment, perfect location with easy access to everywhere and right around the corner from 2 metro stations. Everything was very clean and tastefully decorated and our host was very helpful and polite. Really recommend staying here, 10/10!

reviews.name: Caterina
reviews.text: We had the most wonderful stay in Paris at Thierry's house. The location is AMAZING. We walked pretty much everywhere & the local neighbourhood is filled with great restaurants and patisseries. The house is spacious, clean and has great decor! Be sure to look at the view of the Eiffel Tower from the kitchen or bathroom, especially when it sparkles at night! Thierry's communication has been great and he is super helpful. We met his friend Bertino, who helped us check-in and he was awesome & answered any questions we had. When we return to Paris, we would love to stay here again. Thank you :)

reviews.name: Tom
reviews.text: Thierry's apartment is excellent, it was meticulously clean when we arrived. The flat is walking distance from almost all Paris' famous attractions, and well connected by the metro for everything else. Thanks for a lovely stay.

reviews.name: Kelly
reviews.text: Thierry's apartment is centrally located and a great base to explore Paris from, with easy connections to the metro, bakeries, restaurants and shopping. The apartment was very spacious and clean. Thierry's housekeeper Bertino met us and arranged for check in. On the first night one of the light globes blew and Bertino fixed it straight away (thanks Bertino!) There was also a baby cot provided for our 1-year old which we greatly appreciated. Lastly, there is a great view of the Eiffel Tower from the kitchen window. If that doesn't sell this apartment to you then I don't know what will!

reviews.name: Louise
reviews.text: As s family of 4 we stayed for 5 wonderful nights at Thierrys flat ..- amazing and comfortable and Thierry was a superb host. He (and a friend who was helping as Thierry was away) were incredibly helpful, as our flight to Paris was very very late but they were happy to meet us even at 11 pm at night at the flat. The flat itself was in a wonderful,spot, so many cafes and eateries close by. The metro station is 2 mins away to get right into the heart of things at the Champs élysées and Notre Dame is a 15-20 min walk away. The beds In the flat were amazingly comfortable, and the sofa bed was the biggest and best I've ever slept on. I would recommend anyone to stay here , it was fabulous.

reviews.name: Timothy
reviews.text: Thierry was gracious and very communicative and very helpful. The apartment is so centrally located that we only took an Uber to and from the airport and walked to all the sites for the week that we stayed. The neighborhood is authentic, safe and has everything that one might need for their visit.

reviews.name: Jo
reviews.text: Thierry's apartment was the perfect place to stay when we recently visited Paris. It is up on the 6th floor (with elevators) so the view over the rooftops and to the Eiffel Tour in the distance was just amazing. There are many quaint back streets to wander through and easy access into the tourist areas as well. Highly recommend this apartment. Merci beaucoup Thierry.

reviews.name: Ari
reviews.text: We felt so welcome in thierrys place we did not get the chance to meet because we had such limited time in paris and we were always out of the place when he was around but he was so accommodating and willing to help you can see the eiffel tower from the room!

reviews.name: Ryan
reviews.text: Thierry was very welcoming and his place is beautiful. Just as the pictures show. Close to some great places in Paris, almost the perfect AirBNB. Our only complaint was the stiffness of the main bed. I know it is customary for Europeans to prefer a stiff bed, but my wife and I found it very uncomfortable, bordering on unreasonable. My hope is that Thierry upgrades the bed and pillows for future travelers, as it was perfect beyond that.

reviews.name: Neil
reviews.text: Thierry was a great host and always responded immediately when we needed anything. The apartment was perfect, it was in a great neighbourhood close to a lot of restaurants and right on the metro line. The apartment also had all the amenities and made our stay very comfortable.

reviews.name: James
reviews.text: Beautiful little place in a perfect location. Thierry was a great host.

reviews.name: Erika
reviews.text: First time in Paris with my mom and we could not have asked for a better host and place to stay. Thierry's place is cozy and well equipped, very clean and comfortable. His apartment is in an ideal location. Surrounded by many shops and great cafés, also walking distance to The Louvre. You can see the Eiffel Tower from the kitchen which was definitely a nice surprise!! Thierry is a great host and always a phone call or e-mail away eager to help answer any questions you may have. I definitely recommend his place.

reviews.name: 경민
reviews.text: very nice place!! Thierry is very kind and gentle. Good~~~

reviews.name: Jean
reviews.text: Thierry was so accommodating. My group landed very early in the morning and he was able to get us into the apartment early for a much needed rest after an 11hr flight. His place will give you a real feel for how it may be to live in Paris. His neighborhood is close to most things or a quick uber ride away. There's also a lot of good food spots near by. I'd recommend staying here to any of my friends. Thanks Thierry!!

reviews.name: Stefani
reviews.text: Thierry's place was great! The location is AMAZING - so many shops, restaurants, bars, etc. We could easily walk to many major sites such as the Louvre and Notre Dame. The view of the Eiffel Tower from the kitchen was awesome. Thierry was very helpful and the apartment was spotless. We really enjoyed relaxing on the balcony with wine and charcuterie purchased nearby - like real Parisians!

reviews.name: Hemalatha
reviews.text: Thierry's place is in the heart of Paris. It's a lovely spacious apartment, clean and well maintained. Thierry is an amazing host and helped us out a lot during our stay!

reviews.name: Dan
reviews.text: Thierry was very friendly and helpful. Easy to get a hold of if needed. Great neighborhood and markets within easy walking distance.

reviews.name: Robyn
reviews.text: Absolutely loved staying here - as other guests have said, you can see the Eiffel Tower from the kitchen and bathroom windows (make sure you watch on the hour for a light show!). The furnishings were stylish and accommodated 3 people well. It was convenient, clean, very spacious and comfortable. 5* all round! Thierry was an amazing host and even shared his favourite patisserie with us (it was amazing, and down the road). Absolutely wonderful location, just a word of warning to tourists not to walk through 'Les Halles' (which is about 15 mins away) late in the afternoon/evening - as we were uncomfortable there.

reviews.name: Molly
reviews.text: What an amazing place! It is perfectly located to walk to restaurants, shops, and tourist attractions. It is also close to the metro. The space was the perfect size for two people and it was tastefully decorated. The balcony was a beautiful setting for breakfast, and the Eiffel tower views from the kitchen were amazing! Lovely stay.

reviews.name: Alex
reviews.text: Fantastic place in a great location really enjoyed our stay

reviews.name: Jennifer
reviews.text: Everything was absolutely perfect. The apartment was in a lovely, well connected area. The bonus views of the Eiffel Tower from the kitchen window and the views from the balcony were beautiful. Thank-you for a lovely stay :)

reviews.name: Jenny
reviews.text: great welcome! excellent location and apartment. bit noisy on saturday night but i guess that is not unexpected. otherwise a really great place to stay and very convenient for the Metro. thanks

reviews.name: Lisa
reviews.text: I loved my stay at at Thierry's apartment. It has a wonderful ambience, lovely views across rhe rooftops and is very comfortable and well appointed. The location is fantastic for all of Montorgueil and to the Metro for everything else. Highly recommend this host and apartment and Paris!

reviews.name: Ren
reviews.text: Theirry was extremely kind and hospitable. The apartment is insanely beautiful, with an amazing view from the balcony and the kitchen window. Everything was exactly as advertised, and the apartment was boh clean and beautifully furnished.

reviews.name: Megan
reviews.text: Just absolutely loved staying at Thierry's apartment; we truly felt like we had our own little place in Paris during our stay! The space is really cozy with everything you need. One of our favorite nights was making dinner and eating out on the lovely terrace. In walking distance to the Metro, tons of great restaurants, and perfect central location for just walking around Paris! Thierry is an excellent host, so accommodating and quick to respond with any questions we had. We would absolutely love to stay here again!

reviews.name: Susan
reviews.text: Perfect place for a Paris stay. Thierry is a wonderful host. He communicated promptly, greeted us and oriented us to the neighborhood, and even had a fan which we appreciated in the hot weather. We loved the deck. The location is near any restaurant or shop you would want, walking distance to many sights, and around the corner from the metro. My husband, daughter and I stayed and we had ample space. We hope to return again.

reviews.name: Lily
reviews.text: The apartment was fantastic, Theirry was very responsive and showed us the place. We had a last minute cancellation and he was so kind in accommodating us literally last minute. I would recommend 100%!

reviews.name: Rob
reviews.text: Great location and apartment! Close to metro, grocery shops, cafes, even McDonalds for the kids! Key pickup and drop-off went smoothly, everything was as advertised. View of Eiffel Tower from kitchen window was a special bonus. Loved the balcony! Highly recommended!!

reviews.name: Leanne
reviews.text: The flat was clean and contemporary just as the pictures represented on the airbnb site. The location is great. Around the corner you can find a Marks and Spencer grocery that was perfect to pick up a few things for snacks on the go. This flat is a great value if you have four people staying. I would stay here again and/or recommend this to a friend.

reviews.name: Adam
reviews.text: A lovely flat in a great area. Perfectly clean with everything you need. Check in was easy and Thierry was a great host. The metro literally is a the end of the street but many of the tourist attractions are walkable if you prefer a stroll around Paris. Next time we're in Paris we will be returning.

reviews.name: Emily
reviews.text: The apartment is marvelous. Enough room for 2 adults and 2 kids (11,12) especially by Parisian standards. The place was sparkling clean, Thierry had another gentleman at the apartment waiting for us and he explained everything for us. The kitchen is tiny but functional, the shower is glorious!! This was also the only place in our 3 weeks that had enough towels for us! We enjoyed the balcony and made use of it to have coffee and to hang dry laundry. The neighborhood was perfect as well. We were just a few blocks from Montorgeuil, a bustling pedestrian street with lots of great shops. The metro stop was right by the apartment so it was a quick jaunt anywhere. Overall excellent experience.

reviews.name: Courtney & Nick
reviews.text: Thierry was very responsive to our travel details and made sure arrival and departure was very smooth. The location was great - we hopped on the Metro every day and felt like locals. There are lots of great places to eat as well as local markets nearby. We would get up early and take a right out of the front door up the block to the corner market for fresh croissants. Also, at night be sure to look out the window for the on-the-hour Eiffel Tour sparkle.

reviews.name: Ciara
reviews.text: Great apartment in a fantastic location in Paris- only steps away from restaurants, cafes and food shops. We loved the view from the balcony over the rooftops of Paris and the view of the Eiffel Tower from the kitchen.

reviews.name: Amber
reviews.text: Well what a beautiful apartment. It is so incredibly local to everything and we found ourselves walking to all the sights even with with a six year old. What the photos don't show is the view from the bathroom and kitchen where every night we sat and watched the Eiffel Tower. Such an incredible view! Our host everything you want, knowledgable and accommodating. We would definitely stay here agin.

reviews.name: Rachel
reviews.text: The apartment was exactly as you see on the photos. The balcony was wonderful with atmospheric views over the street and the rooftops. We spent a good few hours there over the course of our stay! Thierry was great and answered queries straight away. You are 30 seconds walk from the Bonne Nouvelle Metro station and a couple of minutes walk in the other direction from a pedestrianised street of great bars and cafes. 10/10

reviews.name: Nicole
reviews.text: Thierry made us feel right at home from the moment we arrived! He gave us a quick tour, made some recommendations, and had the apt stocked and ready for us. It was the perfect place to end our 2 week vacation in Europe!

reviews.name: Tim
reviews.text: This was an amazing flat that just oozed with Paris charm. Amazing safe location with metro station very close. The neighborhood was fantastic very short walk to a great little area with shops and fantastic little eateries. You can walk to the louvre in 15 minutes. The apartment was beautiful. This was the Paris I hoped for and imagined. Tall ceilings, rustic hardwoods. French doors that opened from the living room and bedroom onto a beautiful beautiful terrace. We were a family of four and had plenty of space. The kids couldn't stop talking about how comfy the pullout was! Thierry met us at the apartment when we arrived and took time to explain everything and gave great directions to shops and restaurants. If you want a beautiful, clean, fantastically located flatb in Paris that is full of Parisian charm then stay here. You will love it!!!

reviews.name: Leena
reviews.text: This place was perfect for our time in paris. We loved the area. Metro ,restaaurants,creperie,supermarket all very near. We loved the rue montorgueil market which is very close too.

reviews.name: Daniel
reviews.text: The Apartment is exactly as it is in the photos. It is very clean and brightness. The location is perfect. It is in the heart of Paris and you can arrive the metro station only in one minute by foot. We were four people but the apartment still has enough room for us. Really recommend, will definitely come back again.

reviews.name: Mark
reviews.text: We had a great few days at Thierry's flat. He gave us a friendly welcome and told us all we needed to know. The flat was exactly as described, and is an absolute fantastic location for exploring the great city. Highly recommended...

reviews.name: Wolfgang
reviews.text: Awesome apartment. perfect location with a lot of good restaurants.

reviews.name: Llewelyn
reviews.text: First off. Thierry was extremely accomodating. On the official listing it says check in anytime after 3pm. But my family and I were arriving in Paris at 9am. So I asked whether or not we were allowed to just check in earlier and leave our baggage in the apartment first and start exploring Paris straight away while the apartment gets cleaned up. He glady agreed to that. Kudos to Thierry for being very communicative as well.(Replies really quick) The location of the apartment was excellent. It is literally just 30 secs walk away from the nearest metro and really easy to find. It is sandwiched between two busy streets filled with restaurants and grocery shops so finding food was not a problem. On arrival, Thierry was very friendly. Explaint clearly about the apartment and information about Paris's attractions. The apartment was perfect. It was really clean and had all the neccesties required. Wifi was fast as well. I slept on the sofa bed and it was really comfortable and able to fit 2 people. Though pricier than other B&Bs around the area. This apartment delivers really well.

reviews.name: Sophia
reviews.text: Thierry was a great host. We were able to leave our luggages and go around the city when we arrived on the first day. The location is great. There is a metro stop nearby and it is close to Louvre Museum. The place was clean and perfect for 2 couples. The house cleaner was also very lovely! He gave us directions and recommendations to the best locations! There are also lots of places to eat around that area! Overall it was great. I would totally stay there again.

reviews.name: Deanne
reviews.text: We really enjoyed staying at Thierys place. Fantastic location and having a lift was truly a godsend. The views of the tower outstanding. Communication was great and we were met on time. Theiry helped us store our bags on our last day. We really loved Paris and would recommend this place.

reviews.name: Betsy
reviews.text: Thierry was a great host. Great communication and easy check in & checkout. The flat is lovely. Very central location with a mini-mart right across the street plus cute little bars within a few steps from the flat. The bathroom was very modern with a view of the Eiffel Tower, very unique. The toilet was separated from the bathroom but that is not unusual in France. The Kitchen was well equipped and there was a line to air dry your clothes, very convenient. The balcony was adorable and a nice size. The elevator worked great and the building felt very safe. We would be happy to stay here again.

reviews.name: Pik Ki
reviews.text: Thierry is the best host: responsive, polite with nice personality. He welcomed me on-time in Paris and show me the room. Its definitely good travelling experience staying in his place(with elevator!!!) Highly recommended :)

reviews.name: Martha
reviews.text: Great location right at metro stop. Thierry answered all my questions before trip and while we were there promptly. Clean, and nice comfortable bed. Enjoyed our visit. Thanks!

reviews.name: Kevin
reviews.text: The host made us feel very welcome. The apartment was fantastic, something out of a movie and the view was perfect. Can't recommend this place enough. A great place to stay in an incredible city

reviews.name: Julie
reviews.text: Thierry gave a tour and info about the apartment and left us alone. We appreciated that. There were Paris guide books in many languages available in the bookcase that were helpful. The apartment was spacious in an excellent location to restaurants, markets and the metro. Great balcony to have dinner in the evening. We especially appreciated the lift/elevator. A pleasant surprise - the Eiffel Tower could be seen from the kitchen window. We would definitely stay here again.

reviews.name: Jill
reviews.text: We had a wonderful time at this apartment. Thierry's housekeeper Bertino was prompt, warm and friendly. Everything was clean and worked well. The main double bed was very comfortable and the fold out bed was firm but comfortable too. We loved having breakfast sitting out on the sunny balcony, enjoying the view of the Paris rooftops (and the surprise out of the kitchen window). There was a Carrefours City supermarket close by, but heading south towards the Seine there are all the little shops and bars along the Rue Montorgueil where we enjoyed buying cheeses, pastries and bread.

reviews.name: Pat
reviews.text: This was our first time booking through Airbnb and it was a very good experience. Thierry's apartment is exactly as described and it's situated right in the heart of Paris. I went out for a quick walk soon after we arrived to get my bearings and found myself at the familiar surroundings of the Pompidou centre within minutes. The apartment is very easy to find, the tube station is just around the corner and everything is within walking distance. There is a small shop just across the road which has all the essentials and there are several large shops within a 5 minute walk. The apartment is on the 6th floor and there is a balcony to the front of the property where you can admire the traditional Parisian rooftops. The kitchen is small but functional for holiday needs and has a great view of the Eiffel tower. Thierry always responded to emails very promptly and met us upon arrival to show us around - he lives in the same block so is always nearby if there are any problems. Highly recommended - we hope to return.

reviews.name: Ben
reviews.text: Perfect apartment right next to the metro. Wonderful! Will definitely go back!

reviews.name: Jill
reviews.text: Thierry was waiting for us and explained everything. The apartment was charming with large French doors that opened onto a balcony with table and chairs. The view of the neighboring rooftops was delightful. The Eiffel Tower was visible from the kitchen window.

reviews.name: Andrea
reviews.text: This is an amazing apartment: really well located; spotlessly clean; all the mod cons. Thierry was a great host, he was friendly, welcoming and prompt and informative with all communication. I would definitely recommend Thierry as a host and this apartment for your stay.

reviews.name: Steve
reviews.text: A beautiful apartment in a beautiful area. Thierry was an awesome host.

reviews.name: Mariela
reviews.text: Thierry has been a great host, very kind person. Also the flat was great, near the Metro and it is situated in a amazing neighbour. I really recomend it!!!

reviews.name: Lara
reviews.text: Great flat, comfortable, very bright, and loved the bathroom. Thierry was very easy host, very quick to respond, discreet and arranging. One if the best place I stayed in Paris!

reviews.name: Lena Marita
reviews.text: We staid for 5 days. Arrived late in the evening but Thierry where there to welcom us anyway. The apartment was clean and the view outside the cithen window when we came with the lights om the Eifel tower is somthing to remember. The Metro was rigth outside the apartment and also some nice cafees whith some well tasting croissants whitch we had for breakfast every morning. Short walk to the Louvre, about 30 min. Well equipped apartment. We had å nice stay.

reviews.name: Lei
reviews.text: Thierry is a very nice and gentle host. Actually this was our first time to book house by Airbnb, and we were keep contacting with Thierry for a lot of questions. Here are some competitive reasons why chose Thierry: 1. Location. His apartment is located on South Montmartre. Subway station “Bonne Nouvelle” is around the corner. Very convenient to all places of interests, by subway or even by foot. My friends and I usually travel on foot due to this perfect location. Walk south for less 30 minutes you can get to Musee du Louvor, River Seine, Le Centre Pompidou, Sainte Chapelle, Cathedrale Notre-Dame de Paris, Musee d’Orsay and so on. As a first time visitor, Paris transportation is so difficult to understand. Maybe it is difficult for everyone, Apple and (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN) both don’t provide traffic information for Paris. So I suggest new comers to spend sometime on the routes. 2. Comfortable and Safe. This place is quiet and secured. Nothing could bother you from sleeping during the night. You can stay on balcony for beer or rest on bench. My friends said the bed was soft and nice, and so was the sofa I stayed for 3 nights. The whole building needs 2 step verification to get in so don’t worry about thieves. 3. Decoration. The whole apartment makes us feel good and clean. We even think it’s somehow like a suite room of a hotel. We use kitchen to cook breakfast and wash clothes very easily. 4. Good Owner. Thierry replies us very fast usually, no matter house issues or transport information. His help saved us a lot of time and we all appreciated that. We enjoyed the days in Paris and many many thanks to Thierry. I would choose his apartment when come to Paris again.

reviews.name: Lucy
reviews.text: Lovely stylish clean apartment will definitely stay here again when in Paris Host was helpful and prompt in response

reviews.name: Karen
reviews.text: Great location and clean, the apartment is exactly as described. Prompt responses from host. Easy check in and out. Highly recommend.

reviews.name: Steven
reviews.text: Thierry's place exceed our expectations. Excellent location, and Thierry is a great communicator. We really enjoyed our stay and would definitely stay here again!

reviews.name: Courtney
reviews.text: We had such a wonderful experience at Thierry's apartment! It's really a perfect launching pad for exploring the city. The central location makes it really easy to either walk to or take the metro to anywhere you want to go. Or, the apartment is so charming, it was nice to stay in and drink some wine after our daughter had gone to bed (and enjoy the mini view of the Eiffel tower out of the kitchen window). Thierry very helpfully provided a travel crib so that we did not have to bring our own, which made it much easier. We had no problems with checking in or out and the apartment, we were met by Bertino, who answered any questions we might have had. The apartment looked just as pictured, if not nicer. Very clean and tastefully decorated.

reviews.name: Stuart
reviews.text: We recently spent 4 wonderful days in Paris and we were delighted to call Thierry's apartment our home during our stay. It was the perfect location to easily explore the many sights of Paris and the view of the Eiffel Tower from the kitchen window, particularly in the evening, made it very special. The apartment was well appointed and serviced our family of 3 more than adequately. A special thanks to Bertino who hosted us in Thierry's absence. Should we travel to Paris again we would would not hesitate to return to this lovely apartment. Stu and Renee Australia

reviews.name: Mine
reviews.text: Thierry was very prompt with all communications. He replied emails within hours if not minutes. He was there to welcome us when we arrived a couple of hours before the check-in time. He let us drop our bags off while he finished off cleaning. The apartment is a small but comfortable one in central Paris, super conveniently located. It's close to public transportation and walking distance to many attractions (Centre Pompidou, Notre Dame, Gallery Lafayette, etc.). Montorgueil street which is a short walk from the flat is a great pedestrian street full of cafes, delis and shops. 2 adults 2 kids (6,9) stayed comfortably in the apartment. It has a tiny kitchen which became very handy to prepare meals and save money, with a view of the Eiffel Tower (the light shows at night was fun to watch) and a tiny toilet. Everything about this listing was as described so there were no bad surprises. On the contrary we were very happy with our stay.

reviews.name: Zoe
reviews.text: Good design, exactly the same pictures he showed us. A convenient place, very near to metro.

reviews.name: Andrea
reviews.text: Although Thierry wasn't available on the day we checked in, he made sure we were sorted beforehand by arranging his housekeeper Bertino to welcome us at the apartment. When we arrived at the Area it was 2 mins away from Bonne Nouvelle metro station and everything was within walking distance (5 mins to Strasbourg station, Carrefour market; 15 - 20 mins walk to Opera area). The area in general looked quiet at normal with occasional noises made by crowds drinking nearby. Other than that it seemed fine. The apartment looked exactly as photo and had all the necessities other than shower gel and shampoo. The washing machine didn't have the drying function but the drying rack helped to do the trick. The lift, although looked antique was functioning well - would be better if it could be bigger though. The place seemed well managed and overall we were really happy with our stay! Thank you Bertino for the detailed introduction to the place! Oh - one more thing - the bookshelves in the apartment had different traveling books and guides that previous travelers left behind and we thought it was very nice of them to do so - so if you book Thierry's place you're probably sorted on guides! One last thing - the heater didn't really heat up too much during our cold days in Paris (the blanket did) - not too sure if its a bulding-related issue...

reviews.name: Karin
reviews.text: Lovely apartment with great location (near the metro and great restaurants etc. in the neighbourhood). Thierry is very friendly and helpful! Thank you!

reviews.name: Aaron
reviews.text: Thierry and his listing were great! Not only was the apartment very nice, the location in Paris couldn't be beat. I had four excellent bakeries very close to me on Rue Montorgueil as well as many cafes, metro stations, and short walks to some major sights. Thierry gave me a quick tour of the apartment and let me know some nice places nearby to visit. Plus, you can't beat that terrace view. Twice I just ate my dinner out on the terrace and felt like a real Parisian. Also, you can see the top third of the Eiffel from the kitchen window. Pretty sweet.

reviews.name: Lanochka
reviews.text: That was my first experience as a guest and definitely not the last one. I am glad I got a superhost like Thierry! He was very helpful during my preparation to a trip. The place is in the best part of Paris so most of attractions are in walking distance. Hopefully we shall be back to Paris at more peaceful time and enjoy it even more. My best recommendations!

reviews.name: Abby
reviews.text: This small and minimally appointed but very well located apartment is perfect for solo travellers or couples who wish to experience all that Paris has to offer. Thierry was always prompt with email responses and was helpful through out our entire stay. Great Wi-Fi speed, extremely clean, wonderful street of cafes and restaurants very nearby, and the washing machine is definitely a bonus for long term travellers.

reviews.name: Padgett
reviews.text: We very much enjoyed our weekend stay in Thierry's apartment. Located centrally, it was very easy to find from Gare du Nord on the Metro. It was also a short stroll away from Rue Montorgueil with its numerous restaurants and cafes, as well as Paris' key sights. The apartment itself was just as bright and nice as it looked in the photos, comfortably sleeping 4. Thierry was very prompt and easy to deal with. Would highly recommend.

reviews.name: Forrest
reviews.text: Thierry's apartment was a perfect location from which to explore Paris. It is close to the Metro which we took through Paris and out to Versailles. Even better, there is a pedestrian mall two blocks from the apartment full of interesting restaurants and shops. The apartment had plenty of room for the both of us. Having the washing machine was an added bonus, since we had been on the road for a couple of weeks prior to arriving in Paris.

reviews.name: Richard
reviews.text: Excellent, secure and safe location very close to a pedestrian street with wonderful restaurants. Also very quiet with double pane windows, considering the bustling area just outside the door. Absolutely loved the caged elevator. Also close to several Metro stops, 20-30 minute walk to the Maurais and many other great areas. Apartment was clean and spacious with a sizable and well equipped bathroom and workable kitchen ( with a terrific view of the lighted Eiffel Tour after dark), as well as a wonderful balcony which we used many times. Host was very generous with his time and explanations that were important to us, especially about the clothes washer, which came in very handy. We will certainly go back there when we return to Paris.

reviews.name: Jae
reviews.text: Thierrys place is amazing. We really enjoyed staying there. The location made it easy for us to get to all the places we wanted to go. There were many local shops and restaurants that we enjoyed going. Whenever we had questions he got back to us very quickly. All the things we needed were there. I would at his place again when I visit Paris.

reviews.name: Glenn
reviews.text: My wife and I thoroughly enjoyed our experience staying at Thierry's flat on Rue Poissonnier. The location was convenient to the Metro stop as well as an incalculable amount of restaurants and cafés. Thierry's apartment is well appointed, clean and roomy. We particularly enjoyed the balcony where we would frequently drink our morning coffee while eating a croissant. We met Thierry when we arrived and he permitted us to drop off our luggage before check-in. Thierry's a kind gentleman who clearly takes pride in both Paris and his flat. I highly recommend anyone wishing to have a great experience in Paris to stay at Thierry's place.

reviews.name: Chi
reviews.text: I have two words to describe Thierry's apartment: Perfectly Parisian. From the view of the Eiffel Tower via the kitchen window to the view is the surrounding rooftops from the gorgeous balcony, this place was exactly what we were looking for. The warm greeting from Thierry after a very long flight with a baby was wonderful. We discovered that the location was even better than we expected as three minutes walk from the apartment was a street full of patisseries, boulangeries, and restaurants. Since we were travelling with our one year old baby this was perfect for us as we could grab essentials and lovely food for dinner and we didn't have to eat out every night. Whenever we make it to Paris again, I hope we have a chance to stay at Thierry's. It felt like home for the 4 nights we were there and we were sad to leave! Thank you Thierry!

reviews.name: Marianne
reviews.text: The apartment was the perfect spot to explore Paris. Close to transit and lots of great restaurants. The view from the balcony was surreal. The apartment was spotless. Lots of towels. A big thank you for allowing us to leave our bags on check out day so we could get in a couple more hours of sight seeing.

reviews.name: Katelyn
reviews.text: We had a great visit to Paris and a big reason for this was Thierry's apartment. I can't say enough about the views. It was so fun waking up and seeing the Eiffel Tower from the kitchen window and we enjoyed sitting out on the balcony at the end of the day. The apartment is spacious, clean, and updated. The bathroom is beautiful. The bed was comfortable. It's very close to the Rue de Montorgueil which had many delicious restaurants and patisseries! Metro station is just around the corner. Thierry was very easy to communicate with and kind enough to greet us when we arrived. He gave us the basics as it was our first visit to Paris. We'd definitely stay there again if/when we return. Thank you, Thierry, for your hospitality.

reviews.name: Carsten
reviews.text: Very nice flat in great location! Finding the flat was easy thanks to Thierry's detailed description. The metro is very close and walking down to the Seine only takes about 20-25min. The flat looks welcoming and was very clean. The balcony is perfect for breakfast in the sun. We would happily stay there again.

reviews.name: Ernest
reviews.text: The apartment was in a great location, and comfortable for the three of us. Thierry communicated with us before our trip, answering our questions in a very timely fashion. We met Thierry when we arrived. He accommodated our early arrival, allowing us to leave our luggage there before check-in time. Thierry gave us recommendations on sites to see, restaurants to visit, and transportation tips. The view of the Eiffel Tower was memorable. It was an enjoyable trip!

reviews.name: James
reviews.text: My girlfriend and I had a great stay at this apartment on our first trip to Paris. The apartment was very clean and well located. We loved the balcony and the surprise view of the Eiffel Tower through the kitchen window. Overall we could not be happier with our experience and would definitely stay there again.

reviews.name: Noel
reviews.text: We had a great stay at Thierry's apartment. It was a charming Parisian building which was easy to get to on the Metro. We were warmly greeted by Bertino who showed us around the apartment and explained how everything worked. The apartment itself was wonderful - nicely furnished, clean, comfortable and with everything we needed. The outside balcony is a amazing and the view of the Eiffel Tower from the kitchen window was great. The communication before our visit with Thierry was quick and thorough. We would definitely stay here again and look forward to when we can come back to Paris again!

reviews.name: Taylor
reviews.text: We arrived by train and took the metro to Thierry's apartment which was very easy to locate. The apartment itself is much more than we expected and was perfect for our stay in Paris! Had a wonderful balcony and was located near the Louvre and other major landmarks. Without a doubt this place made our trip a lot more enjoyable! Loved it!

reviews.name: Agnes
reviews.text: Very nice flat indeed! Good location and clean. You can see the Eiffel Tower through the kitchen window. Definitely will recommend it to friends. :)

reviews.name: Hannah
reviews.text: We had a great stay at Thierry's apartment. It was in an amazing building, part of an old cinema complex. The apartment was very nice, clean and furnished nicely. The location was also excellent - next door to Bonne Nouvelle Metro station, a little further down was another Metro stop, so we were well connected to the rest of Paris. The area is nice, it is a main road with shops/cafes/bars etc. It was away from the super touristy part, so that suited us. Probably my favourite part of the stay was the view of the Eiffel Tower from the kitchen.

reviews.name: Vasileios
reviews.text: A very comfortable appartment,exactly what you see in photographs, and very close to metro station (2 minutes on foot). We went 4 persons and it was very convenient.The sofa turns into a very confortable bed,so the appartment is ideal for 4 persons.Furthermore it was very clean.Thank you, Thierry, we had a wonderful stay in Paris.

reviews.name: Mark
reviews.text: We had a wonderful stay at Thierry's well-located pied-à-terre in Paris. Comfortable and clean, we were very happy with the layout, the beautiful bathroom, and the sunny balcony that made a perfect spot for a a cup of coffee or glass of wine. The kitchen was quite small, but it had what we needed: a refrigerator to keep things cool and silverware and plates or a few meals that we ate in. And then we had Final feature that we came to appreciate, (especially after a long day): the elevator that whisked us up to the six floor.

reviews.name: Stuart
reviews.text: Apartment was clean and comfortable with a great balcony. Thierry was very helpful. We had a great stay, would defiantly look to stay here again next time we come to Paris.

reviews.name: Judy
reviews.text: Thierry was very prompt and thorough with advice on arrival. The apartment is very spacious for Paris (where hotel rooms can be so small) and well equipped. In a great location for Metro, tourist buses, restaurants, bars and supermarkets. I walked with luggage from gare du Nord in 30 minutes. Highly recommend this apartment

reviews.name: Tilly
reviews.text: Thierry is very friendly and helpful! The apt is great. Very clean and nice location, just 2 min from the metro. Will definately come back again :)

reviews.name: Sebastian
reviews.text: Thierry is a great guy. He's very reliable, trustworthy and held up communication during our stay. The apartment is located in a quiet side street in a nice surrounding and just 100m away from a Metro station, so you can reach every spot you want to visit in Paris easily within a few minutes. The apartment itself is very classy furnished and you will feel welcome from day 1. The balcony is great for the evening hours and from the kitchen or the bathroom you are also able to see the Eiffel Tower. Thierry also offered us to place our bags in another apartment after check-out, so we could fully enjoy the last day in the city and didn't had to carry our bags around. Great service. I had a nice stay in Paris and can totally recommend this apartment to anyone who wants to go there.

reviews.name: Michaela
reviews.text: Very nice welcome, very clean apartment. Close to Rue Montorgeuil with lots of restaurants. Would book again any time.

reviews.name: Steve
reviews.text: What a great experience I had at Thierry's flat. He certainly made me feel welcome and wanted to know my travel plans so he would be available at the right time to meet me. He explained every detail of the flat and where I could get the Metro and find groceries and wine. The flat is exactly how he described it - the best part is the terrace with morning sun - perfect with coffee and crepes from the store around the corner.

reviews.name: Yaming
reviews.text: Mr.Benoist provided everything needed (maps and descriptions of direction) to approach the apartment, and thanks to that, my friends and I found the right way easily and hardly got lost. The housekeeper, Mr.Bertino is very friendly and kind, he really made me and my friends feel at home. We are very happy about the location: the metro station is only 2 minutes’ walk to the apartment, and there are lots of cafe and restaurants around. oh and you can see eiffel tower through the window in the kitchen, it's good

reviews.name: Ye
reviews.text: Great stay, very convevient, metro station just at the door step to go all the main tourist attactions. Awesome local shops and cafes around. Room is a little bit small for four, but for two is perfect.

reviews.name: Louise
reviews.text: We had a wonderful time in this lovely apartment. Fantastic location. We would recommend the flat to couples or families. Thierry was very helpful and hospitable. It was immaculate. Thank you!

reviews.name: Antonio
reviews.text: Thierry has contributed to make our 3 days in Paris simply wonderful !! The flat was just superlative, clean, very well organized, perfectly furnished. Metro station just around the corner. Thierry is very kind and extremely helpful, always available to give you a good information. All our expectations have been satisfied at best. We strongly recommend Thierry's home. We will surely go there again.

reviews.name: Anastasia
reviews.text: Thierry is very amicable and lovely host! He met us at the evening and show everything. We -two couples, spent 3 nights with all the comfort. The apartment have a grate location, near the big street on which there are many cafes, shops, bakery with fantastic qruassan in two-minutes walk like as metro station! It was easy to find it. Apartment was as describle, nice design, clean and cosy. Thanks for Thierry very much, will be glad to advice your ap. for our friends.

reviews.name: Yan
reviews.text: much better than a five star hotel. decoration with taste. good communication with the owner. will definitely recommend it.

reviews.name: Tim
reviews.text: Great flat. Great location. Great host. Kind and helpful, met us with a smile. Perfect Parisian view from the front and the Eiffel Tower from the kitchen window. Would stay there again.

reviews.name: Liz
reviews.text: Great communication from Thierry before we arrived, and when we arrived in Paris. The flat was lovely! Everything was very clean in the flat and it had everything we needed, as well as a lovely balcony with great view over neighbouring Parisan rooftops. We found our way from Gare du Nord with ease and all the main attractions were easy to get to either by the metro or walking. This is a great apartment in a pretty building and in a central and charming part of Paris.

reviews.name: Harald
reviews.text: Thierry welcomed us and explained everything about the apartment and what to do in the neighbourhood. The apartment was very centrally located, was clean and looked great. Overall a very good experience!

reviews.name: Sarah
reviews.text: We had an absolutely fantastic stay at Thierry's flat. It was in a brilliant location- a few walk minutes to the nearest metro station, a short walk to restaurants and shops and about a 15 minute walk from the Louvre. The flat itself was really lovely- it had everything you could want and was spacious and clean-we loved the balcony!! We would highly recommend this flat to anyone wanting to stay in Paris.

reviews.name: Jackie
reviews.text: Ok wow this place was amazing for the price! Great location, great host, really clean, balcony, everything you could ever want. Thierry was so helpful and worked with us since we ran about 4 hours late! A few notes: - there's a view from the kitchen and shower of the Eiffel Tower that's really look at night especially when it sparkles - great neighborhood, perfect location - the street was a little tricky for taxi drivers though, make sure to say the cross street and 2nd arrondissement. Otherwise you might end up like us getting dropped off in one of the bad areas - balcony was amazing, really made the trip that much better to sit outside and drink wine late at night - elevator was very helpful - clean and very comfortable I would stay here again 100% and would recommend everyone i know to stay here as well!

reviews.name: Henry
reviews.text: Thierry's apartment is very lovely and charming, and it's wonderfully located in a great local neighborhood in Paris where you won't find tons of tourists. The apartment has everything you need; we stayed 6 nights and made our own meals in the delightful kitchen with a view of the Eiffel Tower. The only thing we were somewhat disappointed with is that the pictures showed that there would be a table and chairs on the balcony but there wasn't. It would've been nice to sit outside and enjoy the beautiful sunny Parisian weather on some of the days. I would definitely recommend this apartment to any discerning traveller.

reviews.name: John
reviews.text: Helo Henry, thanks for your Commentary, effectivly the balcony table was destroye just before your arrival, I am soory about that. but now there is a new one and everythinks are in oreder. All the best Thierry

reviews.name: Tom
reviews.text: Lovely apartment in perfect location near to Metro station. Easy walk to Les Halles and Louvre. Well equipped with lovely sunny balcony looking out over the rooftops of Paris.

reviews.name: Pauline
reviews.text: We had a wonderful short break at Thierry's amazing apartment. It was ideally located to explore the city centre, was spacious and very clean. Best of all was the balcony overlooking the street and rooftops, on which we ate breakfast each morning. We can't recommend this apartment highly enough. We were given a warm welcome with helpful advice about the city. Thank you for a brilliant stay!

reviews.name: Clara
reviews.text: Very nice apartment in the center of Paris. Modern clean and tidy! I can absolutely recommend this apartment. The balcony is also amazing.

reviews.name: Katarzyna
reviews.text: The reservation was canceled 4 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

reviews.name: Justin
reviews.text: The place is perfect. Great location, pretty interior. It's easy to reach every place in Paris. I'd definitely reccomend it to everyone.

reviews.name: Terrie
reviews.text: This is an amazing apartment in a wonderfully central part of Paris. We really enjoyed living in it for the short three days we were there. Thierry was very helpful and obliging and we would definitely go back and consequently recommend it absolutely.

reviews.name: Brent
reviews.text: Thierry was a great host. He was quick to reply to any questions and had a packet of information pre-prepared in the room for any common questions as well as manuals for all the appliances. He showed us around and gave us his card with his contact information incase we had any further questions during our stay. The apartment is in a great location and has an amazing view. It's on the 6th floor, with a great view from the balcony of the rooftops nearby and the streets below and a view of the eiffel tower from the kitchen and the shower. The place was very clean and well put together, we started to feel at home by the end of the trip. It is just a 5min walk to the Marche Montorgueil which has many restaurants and bars, as well as a 5 min walk to the metro. We really enjoyed our stay and would definitely stay here again. Great job Thierry!

reviews.name: Eric
reviews.text: This was à very good location! We liked it very much. We had à nice view on the Eiffeltour and it was à good point to start each day in an other direction in Paris. Thierry is à very kind person who had made à very nice appartement with all you need for à good holiday. We recommand this appartement and like to come back here.

reviews.name: Marion
reviews.text: We stayed in Thierry's apartment for just 2 nights. But would definitely recommend it to anyone visiting Paris. We found the apartment to be quite spacious, clean and really very comfortable. We even braved the balcony in late January to take in the gorgeous view of Parisian rooftops. The lift came in very handy with our heavy suitcases and the location was great. Thierry gave us great advice on how best to get to the places we wanted to visit. As well as some queue dodging tips. His apartment also came complete with a whole lot of guide books which were really useful. We found him to be a great host.

reviews.name: Andres
reviews.text: The apartment was lovely and just as described. Thierry was very helpful and gracious. We highly recommend this apartment and host. Thank you, Thierry.

reviews.name: Alejandro
reviews.text: We stayed in Thierry's apartment for three nights. It's a really great place, with the metro, restaurants, supermarkets and bakeries close by. The Parisian rooftops view creates a great atmosphere. The apartment has been recently renovated so everything is clean and new. Thierry was a very friendly and attentive host. He definitely hope to be back soon.

reviews.name: Li
reviews.text: 公寓位置很好!出行方便,出门不到100米就是地铁站,楼下各种美味任选。距离巴黎老佛爷百货也只有700多米。接待的人员也很友好,告诉我们很多出行建议。Apartment location is very good! Easy to travel, go out less than 100 meters is the subway station, all kinds of delicious choose downstairs. From Paris galeries lafayette department store is only 700 meters. Reception staff are very friendly, also tell us a lot of travel advice.
